modShortDescription: This mod is just a localization file that reverts the name changes TFP made to the zombies, because I think the older names fit more for immersion purposes.
modDescription:
This mod is just a localization file that reverts the name changes TFP made to the zombies, because I think the older names fit more for immersion purposes. You need a health bar mod to make this mod work. This mod was inspired by [Ztensity’s renaming outlets](https://7daystodiemods.com/ztensitys-vanilla-creature-renaming/) (he’s been inactive since alpha 19 for some time I think).

All the entities and [turrets](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-traps/) have been renamed.

* junkTurretSledge = Sledge Turret
* junkTurretGun = Turret
* animalMountainLion = Mountain Lion
* animalZombieDog = Zombie Dog
* animalCoyote = Coyote
* animalWolf = Wolf
* animalDireWolf = Dire Wolf
* animalSnake = Snake
* animalBear = [Bear](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-animals/)
* animalZombieBear = Zombie Bear
* animalBoar = Boar
* animalBossGrace = Grace
* animalZombieVulture,entityclasses = Zombie Vulture
* animalZombieVultureRadiated = Radiated Zombie Vulture
* zombieJanitor,entityclasses = Zombie Janitor
* zombieJanitorFeral = Feral Janitor
* zombieJanitorRadiated = Radiated Janitor
* zombieArleneRadiated = Radiated Girl
* zombieArlene = Putrid Girl
* zombieArleneFeral = Feral Girl
* zombieBiker = Zombie Biker
* zombieBikerFeral = Feral Biker
* zombieBikerRadiated = Radiated Biker
* zombieSkateboarder = Zombie Thug
* zombieSkateboarderFeral = Feral Zombie Thug
* zombieSkateboarderRadiated = Radiated Zombie Thug
* zombieBoeRadiated = Radiated Infected Survivor
* zombieBoeFeral = Feral Infected Survivor
* zombieBoe = Infected Survivor
* zombieDarleneRadiated = Radiated Mother
* zombieDarleneFeral = Feral Mother
* zombieDarlene = Infected Mother
* zombieFemaleFatRadiated = Radiated Hungry Zombie
* zombieFemaleFatFeral = Feral Hungry Zombie
* zombieFemaleFat = Hungry Zombie
* zombieJoeRadiated = Radiated Cadaver
* zombieJoeFeral = Feral Cadaver
* zombieJoe = Festering Cadaver
* zombieMarleneRadiated = Radiated Woman
* zombieMarleneFeral = Feral Woman
* zombieMarlene = Departed Woman
* zombieMoeRadiated = Radiated Bloated Walker
* zombieMoeFeral = Feral Bloated Walker
* zombieMoe = Bloated Walker

* zombieSoldierFeral = Feral Soldier

* zombieSpiderRadiated = Radiated Spider Zombie
* zombieSpiderFeral = Feral Spider Zombie
* zombieSpider = Spider Zombie
* zombieUtilityWorker = Infected Utility Worker
* zombieUtilityWorkerFeral = Feral Utility Worker

* zombieYoRadiated = Radiated Carcass

* zombieMutated = Mutated Zombie
* zombieMutatedFeral = Mutated Feral Zombie
* zombieMutatedRadiated = Mutated Radiated Zombie

* zombieFatCopFeral = Feral Cop

Stay tuned because I will release mods like these for other creature or zombie mods and I will release pretty soon a zombie overhaul that adds new zombie types and changes spawns.

Stay safe guys.
